T04bsa003_u:532: aprītiduḥkhaṃ dveṣaistu mahadduḥkhaṃ paratra ca // SBca_5.78 //
T04bsa003_u:536: etāneva samāśritya buddhatvaṃ me bhaviṣyati // SBca_5.80 //
T04bsa003_u:538: guṇopakārikṣetre ca duḥkhite ca mahacchubham // SBca_5.81 //
T04bsa003_u:550: tulyāśaye tu tattyājyamitthaṃ na parihīyate // SBca_5.87 //
T04bsa003_u:551: dharmaṃ nirgaurave svasthe na śiroveṣṭite vadet /
T04bsa003_u:556: na cācāraṃ parityajya sūtramantraiḥ pralobhayet // SBca_5.90 //
T04bsa003_u:558: neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeścāpi garhitam // SBca_5.91 //
T04bsa003_u:560: pralambapādaṃ nāsīta na bāhū mardayetsamam // SBca_5.92 //
T04bsa003_u:562: lokāprasādakaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca varjayet // SBca_5.93 //
T04bsa003_u:571: rātriṃdivaṃ ca triskandhaṃ triṣkālaṃ ca pravartayet /
T04bsa003_u:573: yā avasthāḥ prapadyeta svayaṃ paravaśo 'pi vā /
T04bsa003_u:574: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ // SBca_5.99 //
T04bsa003_u:575: na hi tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ /
T04bsa003_u:576: na tadasti na yatpuṇyamevaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ // SBca_5.100 //
T04bsa003_u:578: sattvānāmeva cārthāya sarvaṃ bodhāya nāmayet // SBca_5.101 //
T04bsa003_u:579: sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe 'pi na tyajet /
T04bsa003_u:589: yato nivāryate yatra yadeva ca niyujyate /
T04bsa003_u:593: kāyenaiva paṭhiṣyāmi vākpāṭhena tu kiṃ bhavet /
T04bsa003_u:595: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ saṃprajanyarakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ ||
T04bsa003_u:599: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:601: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśnute /
T04bsa003_u:602: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite // SBca_6.3 //
T04bsa003_u:606: saṃkṣepānnāsti tatkiṃcit krodhano yena susthitaḥ // SBca_6.5 //
T04bsa003_u:608: yaḥ krodhaṃ hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca // SBca_6.6 //
T04bsa003_u:610: daurmanasyāśanaṃ prāpya dveṣo dṛpto nihanti mām // SBca_6.7 //
T04bsa003_u:616: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim // SBca_6.10 //
T04bsa003_u:620: duḥkhenaiva ca niḥsāraḥ cetastasmād dṛḍhībhava // SBca_6.12 //
T04bsa003_u:622: vṛthā sahante muktyarthamahaṃ kasmāttu kātaraḥ // SBca_6.13 //
T04bsa003_u:626: mahatkaṇḍvādiduḥkhaṃ ca kimanarthaṃ na paśyasi // SBca_6.15 //
T04bsa003_u:628: saukumāryaṃ na kartavyamanyathā vardhate vyathā // SBca_6.16 //
T04bsa003_u:630: paraśoṇitamapyeke dṛṣṭvā mūrcchāṃ vrajanti yat // SBca_6.17 //
T04bsa003_u:633: duḥkhe 'pi naiva cittasya prasādaṃ kṣobhayed budhaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:634: saṃgrāmo hi saha kleśairyuddhe ca sulabhā vyathā // SBca_6.19 //
T04bsa003_u:636: te te vijayinaḥ śūrāḥ śeṣāstu mṛtamārakāḥ // SBca_6.20 //
T04bsa003_u:638: saṃsāriṣu ca kāruṇyaṃ pāpādbhītirjine spṛhā // SBca_6.21 //
T04bsa003_u:640: sacetaneṣu kiṃ kopaḥ te 'pi pratyayakopitāḥ // SBca_6.22 //
T04bsa003_u:643: kupyāmīti na saṃcintya kupyati svecchayā janaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:644: utpatsya ityabhipretya krodha utpadyate na ca // SBca_6.24 //
T04bsa003_u:646: sarvaṃ tatpratyayabalāt svatantraṃ tu na vidyate // SBca_6.25 //
T04bsa003_u:648: na cāpi janitasyāsti janito 'smīti cetanā // SBca_6.26 //
T04bsa003_u:650: tadeva hi bhavābhīti na saṃcintyopajāyate // SBca_6.27 //
T04bsa003_u:651: anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
T04bsa003_u:655: yaḥ pūrvavat kriyākāle kriyāyāstena kiṃ kṛtam /
T04bsa003_u:657: evaṃ paravaśaṃ sarvaṃ yadvaśaṃ so 'pi cāvaśaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:659: vāraṇāpi na yuktaivaṃ kaḥ kiṃ vārayatīti cet /
T04bsa003_u:662: īdṛśāḥ pratyayā asyetyevaṃ matvā sukhī bhavet // SBca_6.33 //
T04bsa003_u:663: yadi tu svecchayā siddhiḥ sarveṣāmeva dehinām /
T04bsa003_u:664: na bhavetkasyacidduḥkhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ kaścidicchati // SBca_6.34 //
T04bsa003_u:670: tadaiṣāṃ parakāyeṣu parihāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet // SBca_6.37 //
T04bsa003_u:672: na kevalaṃ dayā nāsti krodha utpadyate katham // SBca_6.38 //
T04bsa003_u:674: teṣu kopo na yukto me yathāgnau dahanātmake // SBca_6.39 //
T04bsa003_u:677: mukhyaṃ daṇḍādikaṃ hitvā prerake yadi kupyate /
T04bsa003_u:678: dveṣeṇa preritaḥ so 'pi dveṣe dveṣo 'stu me varam // SBca_6.41 //
T04bsa003_u:681: tacchastraṃ mama kāyaśca dvayaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
T04bsa003_u:682: tena śastraṃ mayā kāyo gṛhītaḥ kutra kupyate // SBca_6.43 //
T04bsa003_u:684: tṛṣṇāndhena mayā tatra vyathāyāṃ kutra kupyate // SBca_6.44 //
T04bsa003_u:688: matkarmajanitā eva tathedaṃ kutra kupyate // SBca_6.46 //
T04bsa003_u:690: yena yāsyanti narakānmayaivāmī hatā nanu // SBca_6.47 //
T04bsa003_u:691: etānāśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
T04bsa003_u:692: māmāśritya tu yāntyete narakān dīrghavedanān // SBca_6.48 //
T04bsa003_u:696: eṣāmatra kimāyātaṃ yadyātmā rakṣito mayā // SBca_6.50 //
T04bsa003_u:697: atha pratyapakārī syāṃ tathāpyete na rakṣitāḥ /
T04bsa003_u:698: hīyate cāpi me caryā tasmānnaṣṭāstapasvinaḥ // SBca_6.51 //
T04bsa003_u:702: kāyaṃ na bādhate tena cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi // SBca_6.53 //
T04bsa003_u:703: mayyaprasādo yo 'nyeṣāṃ sa māṃ kiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati /
T04bsa003_u:704: iha janmāntare vāpi yenāsau me 'nabhīpsitaḥ // SBca_6.54 //
T04bsa003_u:706: naṅkṣyatīhaiva me lābhaḥ pāpaṃ tu sthāsyati dhruvam // SBca_6.55 //
T04bsa003_u:708: yasmācciramapi sthitvā mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ tadeva me // SBca_6.56 //
T04bsa003_u:709: svapne varṣaśataṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yaśca vibudhyate /
T04bsa003_u:710: muhūrtamaparo yaśca sukhī bhūtvā vibudhyate // SBca_6.57 //
T04bsa003_u:713: labdhvāpi ca bahūṃllābhān ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhānyapi /
T04bsa003_u:714: riktahastaśca nagnaśca yāsyāmi muṣito yathā // SBca_6.59 //
T04bsa003_u:715: pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet /
T04bsa003_u:716: puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu // SBca_6.60 //
T04bsa003_u:720: parāyaśaskare 'pyevaṃ kopaste kiṃ na jāyate // SBca_6.62 //
T04bsa003_u:724: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā // SBca_6.64 //
T04bsa003_u:728: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ // SBca_6.66 //
T04bsa003_u:730: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam // SBca_6.67 //
T04bsa003_u:731: kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ /
T04bsa003_u:733: evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham /
T04bsa003_u:734: yena sarve bhaviṣyanti maitracittāḥ parasparam // SBca_6.69 //
T04bsa003_u:744: kārito 'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā // SBca_6.74 //
T04bsa003_u:745: na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati /
T04bsa003_u:748: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi // SBca_6.76 //
T04bsa003_u:749: idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam /
T04bsa003_u:750: na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhiḥ parāvarjanamuttamam // SBca_6.77 //
T04bsa003_u:751: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
T04bsa003_u:758: satkāramitvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ kiṃ paridahyase // SBca_6.81 //
T04bsa003_u:759: puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ /
T04bsa003_u:760: kuṭumbajīvinaṃ labdhvā na hṛṣyasi prakupyasi // SBca_6.82 //
T04bsa003_u:761: sa kiṃ necchasi sattvānāṃ yasteṣāṃ bodhimicchati /
T04bsa003_u:763: yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe /
T04bsa003_u:764: sarvathāpi na tatte 'sti dattādattena tena kim // SBca_6.84 //
T04bsa003_u:766: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi // SBca_6.85 //
T04bsa003_u:767: na kevalaṃ tvamātmānaṃ kṛtapāpaṃ na śocasi /
T04bsa003_u:771: atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava /
T04bsa003_u:772: athāpyartho bhavedevamanarthaḥ ko nvataḥ paraḥ // SBca_6.88 //
T04bsa003_u:774: yato narakapālāstvāṃ krītvā pakṣyanti kumbhiṣu // SBca_6.89 //
T04bsa003_u:775: stutiryaśo 'tha satkāro na puṇyāya na cāyuṣe /
T04bsa003_u:776: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me // SBca_6.90 //
T04bsa003_u:780: kimakṣarāṇi bhakṣyāṇi mṛte kasya ca tatsukham // SBca_6.92 //
T04bsa003_u:782: tathā stutiyaśohānau svacittaṃ pratibhāti me // SBca_6.93 //
T04bsa003_u:784: paraḥ kila mayi prīta ityetatprītikāraṇam // SBca_6.94 //
T04bsa003_u:785: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
T04bsa003_u:786: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo 'pi me tataḥ // SBca_6.95 //
T04bsa003_u:788: kasmādanyaprasādena sukhiteṣu na me sukham // SBca_6.96 //
T04bsa003_u:792: guṇavatsu ca mātsaryaṃ saṃpatkopaṃ ca kurvate // SBca_6.98 //
T04bsa003_u:794: apāyapātarakṣārthaṃ pravṛttā nanu te mama // SBca_6.99 //
T04bsa003_u:796: ye mocayanti māṃ bandhāddveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama // SBca_6.100 //
T04bsa003_u:798: buddhādhiṣṭhānata iva dveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama // SBca_6.101 //
T04bsa003_u:800: kṣāntyā samaṃ tapo nāsti nanvetattadupasthitam // SBca_6.102 //
T04bsa003_u:803: yo hi yena vinā nāsti yasmiṃśca sati vidyate /
T04bsa003_u:804: sa eva kāraṇaṃ tasya sa kathaṃ vighna ucyate // SBca_6.104 //
T04bsa003_u:806: na ca pravrājake prāpte pravrajyāvighna ucyate // SBca_6.105 //
T04bsa003_u:812: etasmai prathamaṃ deyametatpūrvā kṣamā yataḥ // SBca_6.108 //
T04bsa003_u:813: kṣamāsiddhyāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ /
T04bsa003_u:816: anyathā me kathaṃ kṣāntirbhiṣajīva hitodyate // SBca_6.110 //
T04bsa003_u:818: sa evātaḥ kṣamāhetuḥ pūjyaḥ saddharmavanmayā // SBca_6.111 //
T04bsa003_u:820: etānārādhya bahavaḥ saṃpatpāraṃ yato gatāḥ // SBca_6.112 //
T04bsa003_u:822: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ // SBca_6.113 //
T04bsa003_u:823: āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ /
T04bsa003_u:824: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ // SBca_6.114 //
T04bsa003_u:828: na tu buddhaiḥ samāḥ kecidanantāṃśairguṇārṇavaiḥ // SBca_6.116 //
T04bsa003_u:830: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam // SBca_6.117 //
T04bsa003_u:834: sattvārādhanamutsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet // SBca_6.119 //
T04bsa003_u:835: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīciṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
T04bsa003_u:837: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yadarthamātmanyapi nirvyapekṣāḥ /
T04bsa003_u:838: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam // SBca_6.121
T04bsa003_u:839: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
T04bsa003_u:841: ādīptakāyasya yathā samantān na sarvakāmairapi saumanasyam /
T04bsa003_u:842: sattvavyathāyāmapi tadvadeva na prītyupāyo 'sti dayāmayānām // SBca_6.123
T04bsa003_u:844: tadadya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditāstanmunayaḥ kṣamantām // SBca_6.124
T04bsa003_u:846: kurvantu me mūrghni padaṃ janaughā vighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ //
T04bsa003_u:849: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarūpās ta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra // SBca_6.126
T04bsa003_u:853: vikartuṃ naiva śaknoti dīrghadarśī mahājanaḥ // SBca_6.128 //
T04bsa003_u:854: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam /
T04bsa003_u:855: tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcidaparāddhaṃ vimānayet // SBca_6.129 //
T04bsa003_u:863: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥsausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi // SBca_6.133 //
T04bsa003_u:865: cakravartisukhaṃ sphītaṃ kṣamī prāpnoti saṃsaran // SBca_6.134 //
T04bsa003_u:866: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ
T04bsa003_u:868: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
T04bsa003_u:869: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vināgatiḥ // SBca_7.1 //
T04bsa003_u:877: tathāpi nidrāṃ yāsyeva caṇḍālamahiṣo yathā // SBca_7.5 //
T04bsa003_u:879: kathaṃ te rocate bhoktuṃ kathaṃ nidrā kathaṃ ratiḥ // SBca_7.6 //
T04bsa003_u:891: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate // SBca_7.12 //
T04bsa003_u:895: mūḍha kālo na nidrāyā iyaṃ naurdurlabhā punaḥ // SBca_7.14 //
T04bsa003_u:904: kimutāhaṃ naro jātyā śakto jñātuṃ hitāhitam /
T04bsa003_u:910: idaṃ tu me parimitaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃbodhisādhanam /
T04bsa003_u:919: māṃsāsthi tyajatastasya tadā kiṃ nāma duṣkaram // SBca_7.26 //
T04bsa003_u:921: mithyākalpanayā citte pāpātkāye yato vyathā // SBca_7.27 //
T04bsa003_u:922: puṇyena kāyaḥ sukhitaḥ pāṇḍityena manaḥ sukhi /
T04bsa003_u:923: tiṣṭhan parārthaṃ saṃsāre kṛpāluḥ kena khidyate // SBca_7.28 //
T04bsa003_u:933: ekaikasyāpi doṣasya yatra kalpārṇavaiḥ kṣayaḥ // SBca_7.33 //
T04bsa003_u:935: aprameyavyathābhājye noraḥ sphuṭati me katham // SBca_7.34 //
T04bsa003_u:939: vṛthā nītaṃ mayā janma kathaṃcillabdhamadbhutam // SBca_7.36 //
T04bsa003_u:941: na kṛtā śāsane kārā daridrāśā na pūritā // SBca_7.37 //
T04bsa003_u:942: bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ /
T04bsa003_u:945: vipattirīdṛśī jātā ko dharme chandamutsṛjet // SBca_7.39 //
T04bsa003_u:946: kuśalānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ chandaṃ mūlaṃ munirjagau /
T04bsa003_u:955: munikarabodhitāmbujavinirgatasadvapuṣaḥ sugatasutā bhavanti sugatasya puraḥ kuśalaiḥ // SBca_7.44
T04bsa003_u:961: anārambho varaṃ nāma na tvārabhya nivartanam // SBca_7.47 //
T04bsa003_u:963: anyacca kāryakālaṃ ca hīnaṃ tacca na sādhitam // SBca_7.48 //
T04bsa003_u:967: tasmānmayaiṣāṃ kartavyaṃ nāśakto 'haṃ yathā janaḥ // SBca_7.50 //
T04bsa003_u:968: nīcaṃ karma karotyanyaḥ kathaṃ mayyapi tiṣṭhati /
T04bsa003_u:969: mānāccenna karomyetanmāno naśyatu me varam // SBca_7.51 //
T04bsa003_u:971: āpadābādhate 'lpāpi mano me yadi durbalam // SBca_7.52 //
T04bsa003_u:976: mayā hi sarvaṃ jetavyamahaṃ jeyo na kenacit /
T04bsa003_u:977: mayaiṣa māno voḍhavyo jinasiṃhasuto hyaham // SBca_7.55 //
T04bsa003_u:978: ye sattvā mānavijitā varakāste na māninaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:979: mānī śatruvaśaṃ naiti mānaśatruvaśāśca te // SBca_7.56 //
T04bsa003_u:981: parapiṇḍāśino dāsā mūrkhā durdarśanāḥ kṛśā // SBca_7.57 //
T04bsa003_u:983: te 'pi cenmānināṃ madhye dīnāstu vada kīdṛśāḥ // SBca_7.58 //
T04bsa003_u:984: te mānino vijayinaśca ta eva śūrā ye mānaśatruvijayāya vahanti mānam /
T04bsa003_u:985: ye taṃ sphurantamapi mānaripuṃ nihatya kāmaṃ jane jayaphalaṃ pratipādayanti // SBca_7.59 //
T04bsa003_u:988: mahatsvapi hi kṛcchreṣu na rasaṃ cakṣurīkṣate /
T04bsa003_u:989: evaṃ kṛcchramapi prāpya na kleśavaśago bhavet // SBca_7.61 //
T04bsa003_u:992: sukhārthaṃ kriyate karma tathāpi syānna vā sukham /

T04bsa003_u:1515: ajānānaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
T04bsa003_u:1517: tadeva rūpaṃ jānāti tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi /
T04bsa003_u:1520: ekaḥ pitā ca putraśca kalpyate na tu tattvataḥ // SBca_9.64 //
T04bsa003_u:1521: sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpi na putro na pitā yataḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1528: viśeṣaśca yadā mithyā kaḥ sādṛśyāśrayastadā // SBca_9.68 //
T04bsa003_u:1534: karma kṛtvā vinaṣṭe hi phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // SBca_9.71 //
T04bsa003_u:1536: nirvyāpāraśca tatrātmetyatra vādo vṛthā nanu // SBca_9.72 //
T04bsa003_u:1539: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate /
T04bsa003_u:1543: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet /
T04bsa003_u:1545: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1546: duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ tu kāryamoho na vāryate // SBca_9.77 //
T04bsa003_u:1548: tato 'pi na nivartyaścet varaṃ nairātmyabhāvanā // SBca_9.78 //
T04bsa003_u:1549: kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca /
T04bsa003_u:1550: nodaraṃ nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ // SBca_9.79 //
T04bsa003_u:1551: na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1552: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ // SBca_9.80 //
T04bsa003_u:1554: aṃśā aṃśeṣu vartante sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ // SBca_9.81 //
T04bsa003_u:1557: naivāntarna bahiḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
T04bsa003_u:1558: karādibhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nāsti kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate // SBca_9.83 //
T04bsa003_u:1562: evaṃ karādau sā yāvattāvatkāyo 'tra dṛśyate // SBca_9.85 //
T04bsa003_u:1567: evaṃ svapnopame rūpe ko rajyeta vicārakaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1568: kāyaścaivaṃ yadā nāsti tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ // SBca_9.88 //
T04bsa003_u:1569: yadyasti duḥkhaṃ tattvena prahṛṣṭān kiṃ na bādhate /
T04bsa003_u:1570: śokādyārtāya mṛṣṭādi sukhaṃ cetkiṃ na rocate // SBca_9.89 //
T04bsa003_u:1572: vedanātvaṃ kathaṃ tasya yasya nānubhavātmatā // SBca_9.90 //
T04bsa003_u:1573: asti sūkṣmatayā duḥkhaṃ sthaulyaṃ tasya hṛtaṃ nanu /
T04bsa003_u:1582: apraveśe na miśratvamamiśratve na saṃgatiḥ // SBca_9.95 //
T04bsa003_u:1584: saṃsarge ca niraṃśatvaṃ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśaya // SBca_9.96 //
T04bsa003_u:1588: kimarthamayamāyāsaḥ bādhā kasya kuto bhavet // SBca_9.98 //
T04bsa003_u:1589: yadā na vedakaḥ kaścidvedanā ca na vidyate /
T04bsa003_u:1590: tadāvasthāmimāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase // SBca_9.99 //
T04bsa003_u:1595: na cāsti vedakaḥ kaścidvedanāto na tattvataḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1596: nirātmake kalāpe 'smin ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā // SBca_9.102 //
T04bsa003_u:1597: nendriyeṣu na rūpādau nāntarāle manaḥ sthitam /
T04bsa003_u:1599: yanna kāye na cānyatra na miśraṃ na pṛthak kvacit /
T04bsa003_u:1600: tanna kiṃcidataḥ sattvāḥ prakṛtyā parinirvṛtāḥ // SBca_9.104 //
T04bsa003_u:1602: jñeyena saha cejjñānaṃ kimālambyāsya saṃbhavaḥ // SBca_9.105 //
T04bsa003_u:1603: atha jñeyādbhavet paścāt tadā jñānaṃ kuto bhavet /
T04bsa003_u:1606: atha sāpyanyasaṃvṛtyā syātsattvo nirvṛtaḥ kutaḥ // SBca_9.107 //
T04bsa003_u:1608: sa paścānniyataḥ so 'sti na cennāstyeva saṃvṛtiḥ // SBca_9.108 //
T04bsa003_u:1616: yadi jñeyavaśādartho jñānāstitve tu kā gatiḥ // SBca_9.112 //
T04bsa003_u:1617: atha jñeyavaśājjñānaṃ jñeyāstitve tu kā gatiḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1619: pitā cenna vinā putrātkutaḥ putrasya saṃbhavaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1620: putrābhāve pitā nāsti tathāsattvaṃ tayordvayoḥ // SBca_9.114 //
T04bsa003_u:1622: jñeyājjñānena jātena tatsattā kiṃ na gamyate // SBca_9.115 //
T04bsa003_u:1624: jñānāstitvaṃ kuto jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ yattena gamyate // SBca_9.116 //
T04bsa003_u:1630: bhūtāni cedbhavatvevaṃ nāmamātre 'pi kiṃ śramaḥ // SBca_9.119 //
T04bsa003_u:1631: api tvaneke 'nityāśca niśceṣṭā na ca devatāḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1632: laṅghyāścāśucayaścaiva kṣmādayo na sa īśvaraḥ // SBca_9.120 //
T04bsa003_u:1635: tena kiṃ sraṣṭumiṣṭaṃ ca ātmā cet nanvasau dhruvaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1636: kṣmādisvabhāva īśaśca jñānaṃ jñeyādanādi ca // SBca_9.122 //
T04bsa003_u:1637: karmaṇaḥ sukhaduḥkhe ca vada kiṃ tena nirmitam /
T04bsa003_u:1638: hetorādirna cedasti phalasyādiḥ kuto bhavet // SBca_9.123 //
T04bsa003_u:1639: kasmātsadā na kurute na hi so 'nyamapekṣate /
T04bsa003_u:1644: icchannapīcchāyattaḥ syāt kurvataḥ kuta īśatā // SBca_9.126 //
T04bsa003_u:1646: sāṃkhyāḥ pradhānamicchanti nityaṃ lokasya kāraṇam // SBca_9.127 //
T04bsa003_u:1650: evaṃ guṇā na vidyante pratyekaṃ te 'pi hi tridhā // SBca_9.129 //
T04bsa003_u:1654: sukhādyeva ca te hetuḥ na ca tasmātpaṭādayaḥ // SBca_9.131 //
T04bsa003_u:1657: satyāmeva sukhavyaktau saṃvittiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate /
T04bsa003_u:1658: tadeva sūkṣmatāṃ yāti sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca tatkatham // SBca_9.133 //
T04bsa003_u:1664: annādo 'medhyabhakṣaḥ syāt phalaṃ hetau yadi sthitam // SBca_9.136 //
T04bsa003_u:1666: mohāccennekṣate lokaḥ tattvajñasyāpi sā sthitiḥ // SBca_9.137 //
T04bsa003_u:1672: tasmādbhāvo mṛṣā yo hi tasyābhāvaḥ sphuṭaṃ mṛṣā // SBca_9.140 //
T04bsa003_u:1673: tasmātsvapne sute naṣṭe sa nāstīti vikalpanā /
T04bsa003_u:1674: tadbhāvakalpanotpādaṃ vibadhnāti mṛṣā ca sā // SBca_9.141 //
T04bsa003_u:1676: na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣu vyavasthitam // SBca_9.142 //
T04bsa003_u:1677: anyato nāpi cāyātaṃ na tiṣṭhati na gacchati /
T04bsa003_u:1678: māyātaḥ ko viśeṣo 'sya yanmūḍhaiḥ satyataḥ kṛtam // SBca_9.143 //
T04bsa003_u:1680: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām // SBca_9.144 //
T04bsa003_u:1682: pratibimbasame tasmin kṛtrime satyatā katham // SBca_9.145 //
T04bsa003_u:1686: tadavastha kathaṃ bhāvaḥ ko vānyo bhāvatāṃ gataḥ // SBca_9.147 //
T04bsa003_u:1691: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti sarvadā /
T04bsa003_u:1694: nirvṛtānirvṛtānāṃ ca viśeṣo nāsti vastutaḥ // SBca_9.151 //
T04bsa003_u:1695: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet /
T04bsa003_u:1696: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati // SBca_9.152 //
T04bsa003_u:1697: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /
T04bsa003_u:1698: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ // SBca_9.153 //
T04bsa003_u:1699: vicāre jīvalokaḥ kaḥ ko nāmātra mariṣyati /
T04bsa003_u:1700: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt // SBca_9.154 //
T04bsa003_u:1706: āgatyāgatya sugatiṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā sukhocitāḥ // SBca_9.157 //
T04bsa003_u:1732: tena sarve janāḥ santu bodhicaryāvibhūṣaṇāḥ // SBca_10.1 //
T04bsa003_u:1745: so 'ṅgārarāśirmaṇirāśirastu taptā ca bhūḥ sphāṭikakuṭṭimaṃ syāt /
T04bsa003_u:1748: tacchastrayuddhaṃ ca paraspareṇa krīḍārthamadyāstu ca puṣpayuddham //
T04bsa003_u:1750: mama kuśalabalena prāptadivyātmabhāvāḥ saha suravanitābhiḥ santu mandākinīsthāḥ // SBca_10.10
T04bsa003_u:1751: trastāḥ paśyantvakasmādiha yamapuruṣāḥ kākagṛdhrāśca ghorā dhvāntaṃ dhvastaṃ samantātsukharatijananī kasya saumyā prabheyam /
T04bsa003_u:1752: ityūrdhvaṃ prekṣamāṇā gaganatalagataṃ vajrapāṇiṃ jvalantaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāmodyavegādvyapagataduritā yāntu tenaiva sārdham // SBca_10.11 //

T04bsa003_u:1755: āyātāyāta śīghraṃ bhayamapanayata bhrātaro jīvitāḥ smaḥ saṃprāpto 'smākameṣa jvaladabhayakaraḥ ko 'pi cīrīkumāraḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1756: sarvaṃ yasyānubhāvādvyasanamapagataṃ prītivegāḥ pravṛttāḥ jātaṃ saṃbodhicittaṃ sakalajanaparitrāṇamātā dayā ca // SBca_10.13 //
T04bsa003_u:1757: paśyantvenaṃ bhavantaḥ suraśatamukuṭairarcyamānāṅghripadmaṃ kārūṇyādārdradṛṣṭiṃ śirasi nipatitānekapuṣpaughavṛṣṭim
T04bsa003_u:1759: rdṛṣṭvāgre mañjughoṣaṃ bhavatu kalakalaḥ sāṃprataṃ nārakāṇām // SBca_10.14
T04bsa003_u:1765: bhavantu sukhinaḥ pretā yathottarakurau narāḥ // SBca_10.17 //
T04bsa003_u:1766: saṃtarpyantāṃ pretāḥ snāpyantāṃ śītalā bhavantu sadā /
T04bsa003_u:1768: andhāḥ paśyantu rūpāṇi śṛṇvantu badhirāḥ sadā /
T04bsa003_u:1773: udvignāśca nirudvegā dhṛtimanto bhavantu ca // SBca_10.21 //
T04bsa003_u:1775: durbalā balinaḥ santu snigdhacittāḥ parasparam // SBca_10.22 //
T04bsa003_u:1776: sarvā diśaḥ śivāḥ santu sarveṣāṃ pathivartinām /
T04bsa003_u:1777: yena kāryeṇa gacchanti tadupāyena sidhyatu // SBca_10.23 //
T04bsa003_u:1779: kṣemeṇa kūlamāsādya ramantāṃ saha bandhubhiḥ // SBca_10.24 //
T04bsa003_u:1790: yāḥ kāścana striyo loke puruṣatvaṃ vrajantu tāḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1791: prāpnuvantūccatāṃ nīcā hatamānā bhavantu ca // SBca_10.30 //
T04bsa003_u:1793: viramya sarvapāpebhyaḥ kurvantu kuśalaṃ sadā // SBca_10.31 //
T04bsa003_u:1797: nityaṃ jīvantu sukhitā mṛtyuśabdo 'pi naśyatu // SBca_10.33 //

T04bsa003_u:1812: mā kaścidduḥkhitaḥ sattvo mā pāpī mā ca rogitaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1813: mā hīnaḥ paribhūto vā mā bhūtkaścicca durmanāḥ // SBca_10.41 //
